meanings.sent1: There were lots of apples in the basket.
meanings.sent2: She had lots of toys in her room.
meanings.sent3: The party had lots of balloons, making it colorful.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter filled the room with lots of joy.
meanings.sent5: The field was covered with lots of flowers, creating a beautiful sight.

meanings.definition: A piece of land used for a specific purpose
meanings.sent1: The farmer owned a lot of land for farming.
meanings.sent2: The school playground was a lot for playing.
meanings.sent3: The park had a lot of trees for shade.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a lot of fertile soil for new ideas.
meanings.sent5: The garden was a lot of greenery in the urban area.

meanings.definition: A group of items sold together at an auction
meanings.sent1: The antique vase was part of a lot at the auction.
meanings.sent2: He bid on a lot of old books at the sale.
meanings.sent3: The lot of paintings fetched a high price at the auction.
meanings.sent4: The lot of jewelry sparkled under the auction lights.
meanings.sent5: The lot of furniture included a beautiful antique chair.

meanings.definition: To divide into lots for sale or distribution
meanings.sent1: The real estate agent will lots the property for sale.
meanings.sent2: They decided to lots the items for charity.
meanings.sent3: She will lots the cookies into small bags for sharing.
meanings.sent4: The company plans to lots the products for shipment.
meanings.sent5: He carefully lots the candies into equal portions for the kids.
